body.raw:
# Heading

## Import

```jsx live=false
import { Heading } from '@totejs/uikit';
```

## Usage

```jsx
<Heading>I'm a Heading</Heading>
```

## Sizes

```jsx
<>
  <Heading unit="h1" noOfLines={1}>
    (60px) In love with React & Next In love with React & Next
  </Heading>
  <Heading unit="h2" noOfLines={1}>
    (56px) In love with React & Next In love with React & Next
  </Heading>
  <Heading unit="h3" noOfLines={1}>
    (40px) In love with React & Next In love with React & Next
  </Heading>
  <Heading unit="h4" noOfLines={1}>
    (32px) In love with React & Next In love with React & Next
  </Heading>
  <Heading unit="t1" noOfLines={1}>
    (24px) In love with React & Next In love with React & Next
  </Heading>
  <Heading unit="t2" noOfLines={1}>
    (20px) In love with React & Next In love with React & Next
  </Heading>
  <Heading unit="b" noOfLines={1}>
    (16px) In love with React & Next In love with React & Next
  </Heading>
  <Heading unit="b2" noOfLines={1}>
    (14px) In love with React & Next In love with React & Next
  </Heading>
  <Heading unit="f" noOfLines={1}>
    (12px) In love with React & Next In love with React & Next
  </Heading>
</>
```

## Truncate

### Single Line

```jsx
<Heading isTruncated>Basic text writing, including headings, body text, lists, and more.</Heading>
```

### Multiline

```jsx
<Heading noOfLines={2}>
  Basic text writing, including headings, body text, lists, and more. Basic text writing, including
  headings, body text, lists, and more. Basic text writing, including headings, body text, lists,
  and more.
</Heading>
```

## Props

<PropsTable
  data={[
    {
      name: 'unit',
      required: false,
      type: '"h1" | "h2" | "h3" | "h4" | "t1" | "t2" | "b" | "b2" | "f"',
      default: 'h1',
      desc: 'Build-in fontSize and lineHeight',
    },
    {
      name: 'isTruncated',
      required: false,
      type: 'boolean',
      default: false,
      desc: 'For single line, render an ellipsis when the heading exceeds the width of the viewport or maxWidth prop',
    },
    {
      name: 'noOfLines',
      required: false,
      type: 'string | number',
      default: '',
      desc: 'For multiline, render an ellipsis when the heading exceeds the width of the viewport or maxWidth prop',
    },
  ]}
/>
